name: You're Next
description: When the Davison family comes under attack during their wedding anniversary getaway, the gang of mysterious killers soon learns that one of the victims harbors a secret talent for fighting back.

review.author: Zmqpshhsghdkd
review.heading: Gory and fun!
review.reviewBody:
I don't understand the low reviews. It's a slasher home invasion movie with a strong female lead.

Great to watch over Halloween!

keywords: home invasion,victim fights back,masked killer,breaking a lightbulb,stepping on a nail
